title: Gating Execution Context Definition (GECD)
description: Defines operational configuration and environment requirements for executing a Gating Integrity Check Manifest (GICM). Decouples runtime policy from check definitions.

context_id.description: Unique identifier for this specific execution profile.

execution_target.description: Identifier (URI or path) pointing to the system/component under audit.

concurrency_profile.description: Limits and throttling applied to the audit execution runner.

max_parallel_checks.description: Maximum number of checks to run concurrently.

global_rate_limit_hz.description: Overall request rate limit enforced against external dependencies.

credentials_reference.description: Secure references (e.g., Vault path) needed by the executor to retrieve component credentials.
